16.  ARBITRATION.

Except as provided in Section 8 herein, in the event of any dispute or
controversy between the parties hereto arising out of or relating to
this Agreement or any transaction contemplated hereunder, such dispute
or controversy shall be submitted to arbitration under the Commercial
Rules of Arbitration of the American Arbitration Association sited in
Washington State, USA for decision in any such matter in accordance with
the then applicable rules of the American Arbitration Association or any
successor organization. The determination of the arbitrators shall not
be subject to judicial review, provided however, that any award or
determination rendered by the arbitrators may be enforced any court of
jurisdiction.
perturbation.changed_text:
18.  SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS

Except as provided in Section 8 herein, in the event of any dispute or
controversy between the parties hereto arising out of or relating to
this Agreement or any transaction contemplated hereunder, such dispute
or controversy shall be submitted to arbitration under the Commercial
Rules of Arbitration of the American Arbitration Association sited in
Washington State, USA for decision in any such matter in accordance with
the then applicable rules of the American Arbitration Association or any
successor organization. The determination of the arbitrators shall not
be subject to judicial review, provided however, that any award or
determination rendered by the arbitrators may be enforced any court of
jurisdiction.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the arbitration clause to the 'Successors and Assigns' section makes it less visible and harder to find, decreasing its enforceability. Arbitration clauses are typically expected in a section specifically addressing dispute resolution.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Lack of clear and conspicuous placement of arbitration clause, potentially violating general contract law principles.

(INCLUDING WARRANTIES OR MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR

perturbation.changed_text:
7.   NON DISCLOSURE

XIMAGE MAKES NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED
(INCLUDING WARRANTIES OR MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR
PURPOSE) WITH RESPECT TO THE SERVICES, SOFTWARE OR DOCUMENTS PROVIDED
(OR TO BE PROVIDED) HEREUNDER.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the disclaimer of warranty into the non-disclosure section buries it within unrelated content. This makes it harder for the customer to readily identify and understand the limitations on XIMAGE's warranties, weakening its enforceability. Warranty disclaimers are expected to be clearly presented, not hidden within unrelated clauses.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potentially violates principles requiring clear and conspicuous disclaimers, particularly in jurisdictions with consumer protection laws.
